item.title: How to Load Gitlab Inside an Iframe
item.description: So you are trying to load GitLab inside another page via iframe, and you are not able to. Due to security reasons, this is default behavior for GitLab, and as per the project (see issue 2347, this will not change, and I agree). However for some internal users this might not be the best approach, so here’s how to enable it. Browse to your install directory and go to your ‘nginx’ folder.
